ts: YOUR BEST PATHWAY TO A UK DEGREE
bourse: 50,000 DH SCHOLARSHIP at the University of Huddersfield
tb: Apply to the NCUK International Foundation Year program at LONDON ACADEMY CASABLANCA
vtp1: Enrol on the NCUK International Year Two Business Management programme at Casablanca International Study Centre.
vtp2: Gain strong academic, English language, and study skills in the field of business management.
vtp3: Progress directly to the final year of your chosen business degree at the University of Huddersfield.
vtp4: Graduate with a prestigious UK degree and launch your global career.
2ts: Why study with NCUK in Casablanca?
2ts1: Save up to 310 000 (MAD) on tuition fees compared to studying in the UK
2ts2: Study a specialised pathway ensuring a focused and relevant education
2ts3: Better prepare your academic and English language skills for success at university
2ts4: Complete your studies with a full BA (Hons) degree from the University of Huddersfield
2ts5: Fast-track your career with a 2-year post study work visa in the UK after you graduate.
test0: Affordable Pathway to a UK degree
test1: Build your academic and English skills in Casablanca with NCUK, then unlock your full potential with the final year of your chosen business degree at the University of Huddersfield.
acc1: Build your academic and English skills in Casablanca with NCUK, then unlock your full potential with the final year of your chosen business degree at the University of Huddersfield.
acc2: Moroccan BAC, IELTS 5.0 or equivalent = Enter Iternational Foundation Year.
acc3: French BAC, IELTS 5.5 or equivalent = Enter International Year One.
acc4: Entry onto International Year Two requires successful completion of International Year One. Other FHEQ Level 4 qualifications may also be used for entry on a case-by basis.
acc5: Entry onto final year degree at the University of Huddersfield requires successful completion of International Year Two.
